resources.string: Animal Ally
We need your eyes and ears to find out where cruelty is occurring! Fill out this form to let your community know!
If this is an emergency
Use this form to add a new cruelty spot or edit an existing one.
Join a boycott of this business
Send an email requesting them to stop harming animals
Inform others of the cruelty happening here
America for Animals
How are you going to help animals today?
Report Cruelty
Put animal cruelty on the map so others can take action.
Track Cruelty
See where cruelty is occurring in your community.
Fight Cruelty
Choose a location and take action with the push of a button.
Show Maps App
Start up the Android Map application.
Show Street View
Show how use a MapFragment in an Activity.
Shows how to use overlays in a an Activity.
